mapper.select: SELECT f.folder_id, f.parent_id, f.folder_name, f.create_time, u1.user_name AS creator_name, f.tag, u2.user_name AS last_modifier_name, f.last_modify_time FROM folders f JOIN user u1 ON f.creater_id = u1.user_id JOIN user u2 ON f.last_modifier_id = u2.user_id WHERE f.parent_id = #{parentId} AND f.folder_id != 0

SELECT f.file_id, f.file_name, f.tag, f.file_size, f.file_type, u1.user_name AS uploader_name, f.upload_time, u2.user_name AS last_modifier_name, f.last_modify_time FROM files f JOIN user u1 ON f.uploader_id = u1.user_id JOIN user u2 ON f.last_modifier_id = u2.user_id WHERE f.parent_id = #{parentId};
